column1: #Text=Every successful business has a risk-management plan .
#Text=Here is how to manage risk when trading stocks .
#Text=Then concentrate on achieving a steady growth in earnings .
#Text=Rather than striving for the big hit , protect your capital first and work for consistent returns .
#Text=You can take more aggressive risk with a portion of profits .
#Text=The big hits and " home runs " will still come along , but let them arrive without taking excessive risk .
#Text=Base your stock-trading business philosophy on three principles ( in order of importance ) :
#Text=Preserve capital in the interests of money management .
#Text=This is the cornerstone of stock trading .
#Text=Before asking , " what kind of profit can I make ?
